Recipes

Load saved model weights 

device = torch.device("cuda:0" if torch.cuda.is_available() else "cpu")
learn = cnn_learner(
    dls, 
    arch=resnet18,
    pretrained=False,
)
learn.model.load_state_dict(torch.load('path/to/model_weights', map_location=device))
